articles.title: China Bans Germanium, Gallium Exports to US in Tit-For-Tat Move - Bloomberg
articles.description: China announced an outright ban on exports of several materials with high-tech and military applications, in a tit-for-tat move after US President Joe Biden’s government escalated technology curbs on Beijing.
articles.content: China announced an outright ban on exports of several materials with high-tech and military applications, in a tit-for-tat move after US President Joe Bidens government escalated technology curbs on … [+236 chars]

articles.author: Elizabeth Rayne
articles.title: Researchers finally identify the ocean’s “mystery mollusk” - Ars Technica
articles.description: It’s a nudibranch, but so distantly related that it gets its own phylogenetic family.
